metadata.description: Choose the solution deployment type from the drop down, for more information about the solution deployment type navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki
Choose Yes/No to add Modbus VM as part of Solution deployment,for more information about the Modbus VM navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki

Choose Yes/No to add dataScienceVM as part of Solution deployment if you required to train the model select the option yes or if model is already trained select the option no, for more information about the ML VM navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki
select Data Science Virtual Machine size if you select dataScienceVm as yes
Choose location for Data Lake Store, for more information about the Data Lake Store navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki

Choose geo-paired region,if you have selected standard (or) premium option in the solution type inputparameter, for more information about the geo-paired-region navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki
Choose location for OMS Log Analytics, for more information about the oms-region navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki
specify the region for application insights, for more information about the appInsightsLocation navigate to https://github.com/nvtuluva/iot-edge-dynocard/wiki/Deployment-Guide in wiki
provide the user name for the SQL server, please make a note of Username this will be used further
provide the password for the SQL server, make a note of the Password this will be used further
Please provide Azure portal login username. This will be used to authenticate data lake store account in stream analytics outputs section.
Please provide Azure portal login password
Please provide Tenant Id of the subscription. This will be used to authenticate data lake store account in stream analytics outputs section
Please provide VM's login Username.This Username will be used for Edge VM,Simulator VM and MachineLearning VM in further
Please provide VM's login password, This Username will be used for Edge VM,Simulator VM and DataScience VM in further
Please provide WebAppPublished zip file url, This will be used to upload into the web application
Please provide Storage Blob url, This will be used to import it into the sql db
Please Provide the Storage Url of plc simulator,This will be used in dynocard vm extension
Please Provide the Storage Url of vcredist,This will be used in dynocard vm extension
Please Provide the Storage Url of plc simulator 2,This will be used in dynocard vm extension
Please provide the IoTHub Edge device name that you want create
